channel.title: project on Datapio
channel.description: Recent content in project on Datapio

item.title: Manage projects
item.description: Overview Datapio provides the resource Project, which defines a set of webhooks. Each webhook has distinct concurrency settings, and a distinct PipelineRunServer will be deployed for each. Alongside the PipelineRunServer, will be deployed Tekton resources to configure the webhook and create the continuous pipeline. The continuous pipeline is composed of: 1 PersistentVolumeClaim as workspace 2 Task: checkout the repository from the SCM inside the workspace run the pipeline code from the repository inside the workspace Example --- apiVersion: datap.
